verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I need thee every hour,
most gracious Lord,
no tender voice like thine,
can peace afford.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I need thee, oh, I need thee,
Ev'ry hour I need thee;
Oh, bless me now,
my Saviour; I come to thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I need thee every hour,
stay though near by;
temptations lose their power
when thou art nigh.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I need thee every hour,
in joy and in pain;
come quickly and abide,
or life is vain.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I need thee every hour,
teach me thy will
and thy rich
promises in me fulfill.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I need thee every hour,
most Holy One
Oh, make me thine indeed,
thou blessed Son.
